participant_1.background: i won homecoming queen this year. my current goal is to run a k. when i grow up i want to be a physical therapist. i'm currently in high school.

participant_2.background: i got a new job just yesterday to be a life coach. i love running and preparing for marathons. i am a clean eater. i'm a cancer survivor. my parents were both very athletic.

content.text: Hell yeah!I got a new job, after all these years finally im going to be a life coach.What is your wish for future?
